DOC.brief_summary: Primary : To compare antidepressant efficacy safety subject receive DVS-233 SR versus subject receive placebo . Secondary : To assess response subject receive DVS-233 SR clinical global evaluation , functionality , general well-being , pain , remission ( Hamilton Psychiatric Rating Scale Depression , 17-item [ HAM-D < sub > 17 < /sub > ] < 7 ) versus subject receive placebo .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating DVS-233 Adult Outpatients With Major Depressive Disorder
DOC.criteria: Subjects must primary diagnosis major depressive disorder ( MDD ) Depressive symptom least 30 day prior screen visit Minimum screening study day 1 ( baseline ) score 20 Hamilton Psychiatric Rating Scale Depression ( HAM D < sub > 17 < /sub > ) Treatment DVS233 SR time past Treatment venlafaxine ( immediate release [ IR ] extend release [ ER ] ) within 90 day study day 1 Known hypersensitivity venlafaxine ( IR ER )
